title: What Autumn Is All About!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Yahoo~, Yoshiko-chan! Are you enjoying autumn?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>“Are you enjoying autumn”? What’s that supposed to mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Nah, I just heard about it from Mari-chan. That you two have been preparing a lot of things to make autumn fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh.... is this.... Is this about the saury fishing trip!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yeah! Hey, how was it? Did you eat the sauries you caught right there on the boat? Tell me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I don’t want to remember I don’t want to remember I don’t want to remember.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh? Yoshiko-chan? Yoshiko-chaaan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah.... S-, sorry. I blanked out there for a second....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>It was that bad, huh.... I’m sorry for asking too. Hey, let’s go eat some meat buns. It’s my treat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Uuu.... Now that’s what autumn is all about....! Let’s get going, You!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
